alternative_parents.description: Inorganic compounds consisting of an assembly of cations and anions.
alternative_parents.name: Inorganic salts

alternative_parents.description: Inorganic chemical compounds with one or more oxygen atoms combined with another element.
alternative_parents.name: Inorganic oxides

class.description: Inorganic compounds containing non-metal as well as metal atoms but not belonging to afore mentioned classes.
class.name: Miscellaneous mixed metal/non-metals

description: This compound belongs to the class of inorganic compounds known as miscellaneous chromates. These are inorganic compounds in which the largest metallic oxoanion is chromate, to which either no atom or a non metal atom is bonded.

direct_parent.description: Inorganic compounds in which the largest metallic oxoanion is chromate, to which either no atom or a non metal atom is bonded.
direct_parent.name: Miscellaneous chromates

kingdom.description: Compounds that do not contain a C atom. Exceptions are made for isocyanide/cyanide and their non-hydrocarbyl derivatives, thiophosgene, carbon diselenide, carbon monosulfide, carbon disulfide, carbon subsulfide, carbon monoxide, carbon trioxide, carbon suboxide, and dicarbon monoxide.
kingdom.name: Inorganic compounds

subclass.description: Inorganic compounds containing a metallic oxoanion to which either no atom or a non metal atom is bonded.
subclass.name: Miscellaneous metallic oxoanionic compounds

superclass.description: Compounds that contains both metal and non metal atoms.
superclass.name: Mixed metal/non-metal compounds
